name: My Unicorn Horse Riding . Free Unicorns Dash Game For Little Girls and Boys
name_original: My Unicorn Horse Riding . Free Unicorns Dash Game For Little Girls and Boys
description:
◉◉ My Unicorn Horse Riding ◉◉

◉◉ Free Unicorns Dash Game For Little Girls and Boys ◉◉

Fulfil your childish fantasy and dive into a magical race where unicorns compete to win!

Look closely at the amazing design of the unicorns and choose the one you think is the funniest or most sympathetic!

Have fun in the best animals race! The Unicorns will be running at full speed on a countryside setting!

The goal of the game is to survive as long as possible with your unicorn! Get as far as possible without bumping against other evil unicorns who will try to stop you continue safely.

Since this is a game suited to all age groups, but especially adapted for children, the controls are really simple. You just have to move the mobile device sideways and tap the screen to go faster with the unicorns!

It is very important to keep the energy bar of the unicorns at it's fullest to get more points!

Features of this Unicorn racing game:

◉ Fantasy landscape!
◉ Beautiful and adorable unicorns!
◉ Realistic graphics!
◉ Perfect game for children!
◉ World Ranking!
◉ Addictive Music!
◉ Free!

Get ahead in each race and beat your own scores! Make your unicorn unique!

If you like the game, you can recommend it to your friends & leave us comments and ratings in the app stores! The more stars the game has, the more you'll help us improve it!
